name: Hotel Analytics
query:
SELECT hrri.date as "Date:Date:",
hr.hotel_room_type as "RoomType::",
hrr.room as "Room No:Link/Hotel Room", 
hrri.item, 
sum(hrri.amount) as "Revenue:Currency:"
FROM 
`tabHotel Room Reservation` hrr INNER JOIN `tabHotel Room Reservation Item` hrri
ON hrri.parent = hrr.name
INNER JOIN `tabItem` i on hrri.item = i.name
LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabHotel Room` hr on hrr.room = hr.name 
where hrri.date BETWEEN '2018-10-01 00:00:00' AND '2018-11-01 00:00:00'
GROUP BY hrri.date, hr.hotel_room_type, hrr.room, hrri.item
ORDER BY hrri.date, i.item_group, i.name
